attributes.action: ensure that, whilst the UK and English parliaments remain one and the same, the Prime Minister must always be an M.P. representing an English constituency.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scottish citizens of the UK have a Scottish First Minister and a British Prime Minister. In England, we cannot be so confident. We could, within the next year, have a Scottish Prime Minister ruling over England. This is not acceptable. Until the Midlothian question is sensibly resolved, we should ensure that only an English M.P. can become Prime Minister.
